answer:
If you are referring to publicly funded vaccines, many public health units will be able to accomodate your request. Please call your local health unit and ask to speak to a public health nurse. You can find the number for your local health unit here.
If you are referring to travel vaccines, most public health units do not provide travel vaccines. We recommend that you contact your local travel clinic to see if they are able to provide you a spot to lie down. You can find the number for your local travel clinic here.  
Immunization Nurse
question: I get a vasovagal response from needles, where can I get vaccinated and lie down for a few minutes?
